Pre-Game Insights: Dallas Mavericks (4-3) and Chicago Bulls (3-4) are set to face off in a non-conference matchup.
Others: Both teams had a 2023-24 season record of 50-32 (Dallas) and 39-43 (Chicago) respectively, with Dallas having a home record of 25-16 and Chicago a road record of 19-22.
Injury updates: Dante Exum and Maxi Kleber are out for the Mavericks, while Zach LaVine and Lonzo Ball are day to day and out respectively for the Bulls.
